name: Kinstone Totem
description: When a card is discarded before the end of your turn, gain [effect0.power][ember].
relicLoreTooltips: For as long as I’ve lived in Hell, I’ve known the Ring filled with Bogwurm remains to be a desolate place with no sentient inhabitants. When Solgard mentioned a Kinstone gifted to him by a clan that resides there, the Wurmkin, I realized there’s so much I still don't know about this place. Or, perhaps, I can no longer remember.
